description:
OpenShot 3.3 open-source video editing software is now available for download with a Wayland-compatible color picker, new default theme, Ripple editing improvements, and more. Here's what's new!

The post OpenShot 3.3 Open-Source Video Editor Is Now Available, Here’s What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: OpenShot 3.3 Open-Source Video Editor Is Now Available, Here’s What’s New
